duties_responsibilities.duty: Performs basic analysis of technical requirements.
Completes technical work under the supervision of and as defined by engineers that are more senior.
Participates in design and outcome reviews.
Prepares and executes manual and/or automated test plans and scripts under supervision.
Applies growing technical knowledge to maintain a technology area.
Applies appropriate technologies to solutions of moderate complexity.
Complete learning plans as needed and become familiar with all of the resources that are available to them.
Learn to work in Agile and Waterfall delivery methodologies.
Participate in daily project and team meetings including those that take place globally in various time zones.
Participate in technical and leadership development learning groups.

education_certification.credential: BS in related field or Code Camp certificate or equivalent education/experience.
